thread.title: 17 Photos That Prove Googly Eyes Make Even The Creepiest Creatures Cute
thread.title_full: 17 Photos That Prove Googly Eyes Make Even The Creepiest Creatures Cute

author: Crystal Ro
title: 17 Photos That Prove Googly Eyes Make Even The Creepiest Creatures Cute
text:
View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / Velvetfish / Getty ID: 10316987 2. This normally angry, venomous, bush viper actually looks very happy to see you with his googly eyes on. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / Mark Kostich / Getty ID: 10317044 3. This home spider doesn’t want to pounce, he’s just asking for a hug! View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / JoyTasa / Getty ID: 10322291 4. This dangerous great white shark is swimming up to you just to say, “hi” with googly eyes on. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / Whitepointer / Getty ID: 10322466 5. This googly-eyed cockroach is one you’d probably welcome into your home. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / Wi6995 / Getty ID: 10322426 6. This scary looking spider? Not so scary with googly eyes. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / xenovon / Getty ID: 10322493 7. This normally frightening barracuda is a TOTAL goofball with googly eyes. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / Global_Pics / Getty ID: 10322563 8. This icky, fluffy red velvet mite for SURE is better with googly eyes. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / StevenEllingson / Getty ID: 10322336 9. This brown leaf hopper would be yelp-inducing in person, but is kinda cute with googly eyes. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / StevenEllingson / Getty ID: 10322528 10. This feasting fly looks pretty adorable, TBH, with googly eyes. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / Getty ID: 10322578 11. This scary AF scorpion looks like he’s just here to make friends with googly eyes on. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / lamyai / Getty ID: 10322593 12. This greyface moray eel is practically a Disney character in these googly eyes. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / atese / Getty ID: 10322664 13. This traditionally yucky brown centipede looks more like a “Mr. Centipede” with those adorable googly eyes. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / praisaeng / Getty ID: 10322627 14. This yellow land crab? Yup. Better with googly eyes. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / ANDREYGUDKOV / Getty ID: 10322690 15. This woodlouse would normally make me want to vomit, but with googly eyes it’s A-okay. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / paulrommer / Getty ID: 10322649 16. This piranha looks like he’s deep in thought with googly eyes. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / Rdlamkin / Getty ID: 10322764 17. And finally, this golden Thai python is absolutely, 100%, undoubtedly huggable with googly eyes on. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / Suradin / Getty ID: 10322747 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
